member.name: NMKEY
member.summary: Contains information used with key notification messages.

member.name: NMKEY.hdr
member.summary: An structure that contains additional information about this notification.

member.name: NMKEY.nVKey
member.summary: A virtual key code of the key that caused the event.

member.name: NMKEY.uFlags
member.summary: Flags associated with the key. These are the same flags that are passed in the high word of thelParam parameter of the WM_KEYDOWN message.
